name: Mad Crown
detailed_description:
Reminder:
Our rough language mod tool is available now!(And a sketchy English version is included as well)
the completed official English version is still under development and will be released as we are ready to launch the game.
Should you have any questions, please feel free to send an email to akasha@s-game.com.cn.

Mad Crown is a strategic adventure game combined with roguelike elements. As an explorer, you, in quest of the legendary crown, use limited resources and meticulous tactics to fight the eerie enemy in random Ruins. What awaits you is an unpredictable fear.




World Settings
Human beings set themselves on the path of destruction with nuclear weapons. Meanwhile, the huge creature slumbering in the depths of the earth awaken to fight an earth-shaking battle against alien visitors. What human beings hear and see is like the apocalypse of the world as written in ancient books.
With the end of the battle between the giant gods, the few survivors began to rebuild civilization on the mutilated land.
And now, a hundred years later, the legend of mad crown has spread all over the world, seemingly heralding new events.


Game Features
  • Optimized roguelike elements
    Initial level zero setting, death punishment, backpack management, hunger degree, randomly generated Ruins
    The familiar optimized mechanism brings fresh experiences
  • Adventurers reciprocal rescue!
    Death punishment is too hard? The adventurers reach out to each other and retrieve all lost items
    Join the rescue team to help other adventurers killed in the Ruins in the network, and win respect and rewards
  • Witty monster character mechanism
    Afraid of fire, timid, greedy, various interesting monster characters
    Fighting is not just a pile of numbers and also brings richer battle strategy with more latitude
  • Abundant game content
    10 available characters of different styles
    27 types of enemies with different characteristics
    Over 200 items
    Challenging levels and special modes
    Continuous upgrade followed!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Win 7/8/10
  • Processor: 1.7 GHz+
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GeForce 8800 or Radeon® HD4800 series, 512 MB of memory
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
